transArray.content: The service attitude is super good, the breakfast is great, the room is clean and tidy

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The hotel is located in the business district. Such a location provides guests with great convenience for eating, accommodation, travel, entertainment and shopping. I am very happy to see your recognition of the hotel staffâ€™s service. Your pleasant stay is a great encouragement to us. Everything we do is to provide every guest with a home-like stay experience. At the same time, the products and services we deliver are of reliable quality, clean and safe. First of all, we are really touched to see your satisfaction and affirmation. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel are looking forward to your next stay. Thank you! General Manager: Li Changxia
